name: Farm Plinko Go
description:
It is a brand new free Plinko game with infinite fun. All you need to do is simply clicking on the screen. Play the best FREE Plinko game every day, relax and collect big prizes! With a little luck and skill, you could become the next lucky dog!
HOW TO PLAY:
◈ Tap the screen to throw the balls, earn infinite coins.
◈ When the balls fall into the slots, you will definitely play slots game to win big prizes.
◈ If the balls run out, check back later and more balls will be available!
FEAFURES:
—Easy control: anyone can get started right away.
—Fast: drop the balls constantly.
—Exciting: continuous pitching, unlimited collisions, super rewards.
—Kill Time: Relaxing game maps to relieve your stress.
The more balls you drop, the more and bigger rewards you win. Big jackpot and other surprises are waiting for you! Come on! It’s time to download and play Plinko Go now!
